long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
People seriously still use referral links in urls?  Those long, ugly urls are really annoying.

This chrome extension replaces the values of UTM referral parameters with YO MAMA.  Go from this:
www.mywebsite.com/?utm_source=google&utm_medium=email&utm_term=running%20shoes&utm_content=logolink&utm_campaign=aug14sale

To this!
www.mywebsite.com/?utm_source=YO%20MAMA&utm_medium=YO%20MAMA&utm_term=YO%20MAMA&utm_content=YO%20MAMA &utm_campaign=YO%20MAMA
